description: Michal Linow  Born in 1986 in Gdańsk, Poland. Fomerly tied closely to street art, now creates paintings, objects and video. His creations break the cyberspace myth and expose tension between real and virtual world. He creates subversive comments on commercialization of reality. Compulsively hoardes pictures and motives off the internet to compose, humorous and ironic comment to modern world from.
